name: Skip8tracks
tagline: Chrome Browser Extension to add skip Button to 8tracks
body:
# 8tracks - BlacklistR
Adds an X-Button to the player of 8tracks.com to put songs on a blacklist and skip these always.
[added button](https://github.com/BenRichter/skip8tracks/blob/master/preview1.png)

Remove Tracks from List on Options-Page.
[options pane](https://github.com/BenRichter/skip8tracks/blob/master/preview2.JPG)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
